channel.title: Alrunic 317 loading 474!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]https://alrunic.com/images/logo/merhania.png[/img] Forums:[URL=http://"Alrunic.com"]Alrunic.com[/URL] Client:http://www.alrunic.com/client/client.jar
[size=14pt][U]Alrunic [/U]is a RSPS based off the 317 revision loading pure 474 data and is loosely similar to the successful server once known as [U][B]Exorth[/B][/U].[/size]
We are currently in Beta and have been working very hard on this.
[b][u]What do we have to offer:[/u][/b]
Nostalgic environment; we all remember those good old times of Barrows and Godswords were our bread and butter. Bosses(With a Key system) Perfect skilling(We place close attention to every detail of each skill to make sure the end result is amazing. Active Administration Friendly Community- We will always receive new members with open arms.
[U][b]Media:[/b][/U]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TFSbr8k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4BIoUEL.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FWwclDw.png[/img]
[b][U]Active Bossing[/U][/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nl5SLtP.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1cw44mI.png[/img]
[b][color=purple][U]Message across server with Boss is killed.[/U][/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hhD8QCQ.png[/img]
[b][U]Custom Spellbook[/U][/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/v7Fbs8e.png[/img]
[color=purple][U]Active Community![/U]
[size=18pt][color=purple][b][u]Join us today and live the experience yourself![/U][/b][/size]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Alrunic 317 loading 474!
item.dc:creator: @georshua georshua
item.description:
@georshua wrote:

[CENTER]
Forums:[URL=http://“Alrunic.com”]Alrunic.com[/URL]
Client:http://www.alrunic.com/client/client.jar

[size=14pt][U]Alrunic [/U]is a RSPS based off the 317 revision loading pure 474 data and is loosely similar to the successful server once known as [U][B]Exorth[/B][/U].[/size]

We are currently in Beta and have been working very hard on this.

What do we have to offer:

Nostalgic environment; we all remember those good old times of Barrows and Godswords were our bread and butter.
Bosses(With a Key system)
Perfect skilling(We place close attention to every detail of each skill to make sure the end result is amazing.
Active Administration
Friendly Community- We will always receive new members with open arms.

[U]Media:[/U]

[U]Active Bossing[/U]

[color=purple][U]Message across server with Boss is killed.[/U]
